name: Dogtective (Jess Andz, TheLoveDoctor, chickendude, BackAt50Ft)
description:
This game was made in 10 days for the Godot Wild Jam #24!

You haven’t seen grandpa since a month ago, something’s wrong and you’re going to find out what it is.

Under the bed? No.

Inside the wardrobe? No…

Just, where is he…?  

CREDITS

Programming Team: BackAt50Ft, Crush.

Character Designs & Character Animations: Jess Andz.

Props Art: Crush.

Music & Sound Design: Mathias Drgon.

CONTROLS

Arrows/wasd to move around.

Click to acknowledge dialog, click again to dismiss it.
